description:
This is For All The Brainwashed Idiots who compare 5G's Radiation to the sun 🤦🏻‍♂️🤦🏻‍♂️🤦🏻‍♂️ How can we believe that the sun, which is responsible for all life on Earth and gives us vitamin D which is absolutely essential for us to live, would cause cancer?
👀
They tell us this, because they don’t want us going out into the sun. This in turn makes us sick and then we pay huge amounts of money when we get sick from using sunscreen all the time. A 2004 medical journal study actually showed that people who work indoors were twice as likely to get skin cancer as opposed to people who worked outdoors and received sunlight daily.
Not getting enough sun leads to low vitamin D levels which then leads to a whole world of health problems.
☀️
And the next subject for this post is sunburn. Sunburn occurs because our body is in a toxic state and our skin is filled with mucus. 
For someone who eats mainly plant-based foods, they will surely notice that they do not get sunburnt easily if at all. They can be in the blistering sun for hours and will not get burned. 
Meat/dairy are highly acidic mucus forming foods which help to weaken the entire body and the skin which leads to sunburn when being out in the sun. 
Rid those foods immediately!
Use coconut oil for a sunscreen instead!
